name: 蔡定江
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意
一維系統的自由及強制振動
多維系統的自由及強制振動
自然頻率的計算與模態分析
振動的控制
振動量測與應用
振動系統之數值分析方法
非線性振動
機構與動力傳動元件的振動分析
schedule:
1 Basic concepts of vibration
2 Free vibrations of single degree of freedom systems
3 Harmonically forced vibrations of single degree of freedom systems
4 Genernal forced vibrations of single degree of freedom systems
5 Free vibration analysis of two degree of freedom systems
6 Forced vibration analysis of two-degree of freedom systems
7 Modeling of continuous systems as multidegree of freedom systems
8 Derive equations of motion for multi-degree of freedom systems
9 期中考
10 Eigenvalue problem of multi-degree of freedom systems
11 Solution of multi-degree of freedom systems
12 Continuous systems: string, rod
13 Continuous systems. beam plate
14 Vibration measurement and applications
15 Vibration measurement and applications
16 Introduction to numerical methods in vibration analysis
17 Application of CAE package
18 期末考
scorePolicy:
1. Homework 10%
2. 4~5 examination 60%
3. final examination and/or term paper 30%
materials:
Text:
Mechanical Vibrations 4th ed.
Singiresu S. Rao
Pearson Prentice Hall
Refs:
1. Leonard Meirovitch, fundamental of vibrations
2. W. T. Thomson, Theory of Vibration with Applications
3. Tes, Morse, Hinkle, Mechanical Vibration
4. Balachandran Magrab, Vibrations
5. Leonard Meirovitch, Analytical Methods in Vibrations
6. 王栢村，振動學，全華
